nodes.text: Greenputt was a sport played by all kinds of beings in the galaxy. This sport was played on a wide playing field and required each player to hit a tiny ball into a remote hole. The game required a wide range of hitting skills to get the ball in the hole.[source?] The major leagues were controlled by the Greenputt Governing Council.
The council formed the newest league—the Non-Sentient Professional Greenputt Tour—after discovering three Ambrian neeks and a Taurill named Bortis as capable players.
